entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
